attributes.action: Help my sister, she has Chrons disease
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My sister has Chrons disease. She has had little or no help from her doctor or specialists to which she has been refered. 
There are thousands of suferers in the Uk with this affliction yet there is very little awareness of the disease. 
I petition that she be given a disabled toilet key, so she may go in peace.

rejection.details: The petitions site can not accept petitions relating to individual cases. We suggest you reword your petition to make it more general and resubmit.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
